name: Ashadeep Association
briefDescription: Ashadeep Association is a charitable organization working since 1976 for the very poor and needy single parent children, orphans, handicapped and widows.  We execute our activities through our 7 day care centers located within the western suburbs of Mumbai.  Ashadeep help the children with food, education and clothing, without separating them from their parent and their environment they are used to.  The prime focus of our organization is to provide formal education to the children, for their bright and better future.
